description:
## Release (2024-10-08)

react-shepherd 6.1.2 (patch)
shepherd.js 14.0.0 (major)

#### :boom: Breaking Change
* `shepherd.js`
  * [#2976](https://github.com/shipshapecode/shepherd/pull/2976) Update license to AGPL-3.0 ([@RobbieTheWagner](https://github.com/RobbieTheWagner))
* Other
  * [#2969](https://github.com/shipshapecode/shepherd/pull/2969) ğŸ“„ Update license for commercial use cases ([@chuckcarpenter](https://github.com/chuckcarpenter))

#### :rocket: Enhancement
* `landing`, `shepherd.js`, `cypress-tests`
  * [#2982](https://github.com/shipshapecode/shepherd/pull/2982) âœ¨ Update shepherd element to use html dialog ([@chuckcarpenter](https://github.com/chuckcarpenter))

  * [#2980](https://github.com/shipshapecode/shepherd/pull/2980) ğŸ› Fix event timing issue and add button for demo start ([@chuckcarpenter](https://github.com/chuckcarpenter))
